title: Adaptive compression framework for giga-pixel whole slide images
description: Lee and colleagues present AdaSlide, an AI-driven adaptive compression system for gigapixel pathology slides that preserves diagnostic quality while reducing storage by up to 90%, enabling scalable and cost-efficient digital pathology archiving.
content: <li>Abels, E. et al. Computational pathology definitions, best practices, and recommendations for regulatory guidance: a white paper from the digital pathology association. J. Pathol.249, 286294 (201… [+11589 chars]
